root: ^Holding the grail, you wait for the knight ghost to stop trying to pull the sword from the stone.
^The knight ghost draws back from the sword with a hiss, stumbling back a few paces from another failed effort.
^You toss it as far as you can past the ghost’s head.
^The knight ghost takes off in the direction of the grail and you sprint towards the sword like your life depends on it.
^Faint markings of a seal are inscribed in the stone. Purple smoke drifts out of it at your touch.
